emulator.name: Hoot
emulator.comment: A sound emulator that emulates a huge number of systems. You can configure it to play additional games on supported hardware through an XML formatted configuration file. For instructions on using this emulator, visit http://crashtest.retrogames.com/Hoot/index.html (it is the configuration from this page that was used for the game list below).

files.file: Hoot configuration from CrashTest's page (most of the drivers are by Ryo Takaoka)
